title: True Ambition White is Recruiting! Plat 2+

embed.description: The latest Tweets from True AmBition, LLC (@TrueAmBitionGG). International gaming organization with teams in multiple games. WorldWide

body:
True Ambition is an international competitive gaming organisation based around smash. They have recently branched out into League of Legends and are looking to for a sister team to scrim against the main roster. This team will also participate in tournaments alongside the main team and maybe even play in the main roster.

We are looking for players with:

* A ranking of Platinum 2 or higher.

* A good attitude about improving as a player and a team.

* A microphone.

* Skype and/or Teamspeak installed.

* The ability to co-operate with other members of a team. (Basically no solo queue attitude)

To apply - Add me in game or copy and paste the template into the response section of this thread.

IGN & Real Name:
Age:
Rank:
Role:
Best/Favourite Champions:
What you can bring to the team:
Availability for practice:

Thanks - NewTronix

What you can bring to the team: I'm best at setting up opportunities for team mates to allow them to carry the game. I have a good understanding of how to win the game through drafts  & objective play, and I keep track of the international meta to pick up on strong new picks early. 
Availability for practice: Most workday evenings/nights + some weekends, however running on NZ time means that I'm not always able to play as late into the night as some aussies if I want to stay awake the next day.













pick me luka. pick me.
